price: Onlar, kendi yüklerini ve kendi yükleriyle beraber başka yükleri de taşırlar. Kıyamet günü de uydurduklarından sorguya çekilirler.
arabic: وَلَيَحۡمِلُنَّ أَثۡقَالَهُمۡ وَأَثۡقَالٗا مَّعَ أَثۡقَالِهِمۡۖ وَلَيُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عَمَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walayaḥmilunna athqālahum wa-athqālan maʿa athqālihim walayus'alunna yawma al-qiyāmati ʿammā kānū yaftarūna
translations: and surely they will be questioned
